company.name: Suzhou SIPUMTECH Electronic Technology Co., Ltd.
company.full_description: Established in Suzhou in 2019, as a leading domestic comprehensive service provider for advanced system-level packaging design and hardware/software development one-stop solutions
company.slogan: Join hands for the future, seek common development

hero.title_1: Creating Excellence in Advanced Packaging and Hardware/Software Development One-Stop Solutions
hero.subtitle_2: Rapid Response · Quality Assurance · One-Stop Solutions

about.title: About SIPUMTECH
about.intro_highlight: Suzhou SIPUMTECH Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. was established in 2019, headquartered in Suzhou, as a leading domestic comprehensive service provider for advanced system-level packaging design and hardware/software development one-stop solutions.
about.intro_description: The company focuses on advanced packaging technology and hardware solution development, with professional technical teams and comprehensive service systems, providing customers with full-process solutions from design to testing.
about.team_overlay_desc: Professional teams in hardware design, SIP design, PCB design, software development, thermal and electrical simulation

business.title: Core Business
business.subtitle: Professional advanced system-level packaging design and hardware/software development one-stop services

advanced_packaging.subtitle: Advanced Packaging
advanced_packaging.title: Advanced Packaging
advanced_packaging.description: Providing wafer back-end bump, RDL optimization and design processing, wafer-level design packaging (WLCSP), silicon interposer, through-silicon via (TSV) design and processing services.
advanced_packaging.feature_2: IC test board design and processing

hardware_solution.subtitle: Hardware Solutions
hardware_solution.title: Hardware & Software Solutions
hardware_solution.description: Hardware solution development, schematic and PCB design, board-level and system-level simulation, embedded driver and host computer software development services.

technology.title: Technology Capabilities
technology.subtitle: Professional technical teams and comprehensive technical systems
technology.overview_description: SIPUMTECH has professional technical teams including hardware design, SIP design, PCB design, software development, thermal and electrical simulation, providing comprehensive technical services to customers.
technology.highlight_1_desc: Master the latest packaging process technologies
technology.highlight_3_desc: Customized solutions based on customer needs
technology.capability_1_desc: WLCSP, TSV, RDL and other advanced packaging technologies to meet high-density and high-speed packaging requirements
technology.capability_2_desc: Full-process hardware development services including schematic design, PCB design, and system-level simulation
technology.capability_3_desc: MEMS probe card design, Load board test board design, test board assembly, etc.
technology.capability_4_desc: Thermal and electrical simulation, signal integrity analysis, electromagnetic compatibility design, etc.

cases.title: Success Cases
cases.subtitle: Providing professional technical solutions for customers in multiple industries
cases.overview_description: SIPUMTECH's services cover multiple key cities nationwide, providing professional services for communication/servers, research institutes, industrial control equipment, medical equipment, universities and other industries.
cases.sector_1_desc: Providing high-performance packaging solutions for communication equipment and server manufacturers
cases.sector_2_desc: Supporting cutting-edge technology R&D and industrialization applications of research institutes
cases.sector_3_desc: Providing reliable hardware solutions for industrial control equipment
cases.sector_4_desc: Providing high-precision packaging technology services for medical equipment manufacturers
cases.sector_5_desc: Cooperating with universities on industry-academia-research integration projects

news.title: News & Updates
news.news_1_excerpt: SIPUMTECH has been awarded the High-Tech Enterprise Certification, marking the company's authoritative recognition in technological innovation and R&D capabilities...
news.news_2_title: SIPUMTECH: Technological Innovation Drives Industry Development
news.news_2_excerpt: SIPUMTECH: Technological innovation drives industry development. The company continues to increase R&D investment and promote the industrialization of advanced packaging technologies...
news.news_3_excerpt: 'Happy New Year everyone!' The chairman of SIPUMTECH smiled and waved to the employees working during the Spring Festival, 'Happy New Year, Chairman...'
